actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to extend certain benefits to individuals adopted by disability or old-age insurance beneficiaries.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Extends child's insurance benefits under Title II of the Social Security Act (OASDI) to individuals adopted by disability or old-age insurance beneficiaries.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to extend certain benefits to individuals adopted by disability or old-age insurance beneficiaries.
